name: Zombie Pandemic (retrogressionGame)
description:
This is a project that is not complete but is playable for this one level demo.  Save the girls and pick up various implements of destruction to eliminate the zombie threat before they infect all citizens!  Collect journal pages scattered throughout the zones and find the gate key to leave a 15-minute city zone for the next.

Controls

Arrow keys  <-- --> rotate car

SPACE BAR fire current weapon

ALT Drop Bomb (if you have one)

S  Speed Up

X Slow Down

J  Open/Close Journal.   Use arrow keys to navigate pages.
